mapper.select: select sys_charging_pile_info.ble_name, sys_charging_pile_record.charging_time, sys_charging_pile_info.voltage, sys_charging_pile_info.current, sys_charging_pile_info.power from sys_charging_pile_info inner join sys_charging_pile_record on sys_charging_pile_info.charging_pile_id = sys_charging_pile_record.charging_pile_id where sys_charging_pile_record.charging_pile_id = #{ChargingPileId}
